thread.title: The cool hotel guide: the Horse and Groom, Bourton-on-the-Hill, Gloucestershire
thread.title_full: The cool hotel guide: the Horse and Groom, Bourton-on-the-Hill, Gloucestershire

title: The cool hotel guide: the Horse and Groom, Bourton-on-the-Hill, Gloucestershire
text:
The rooms are spacious and decorated warmly 2 of 5 The head chef has flair 3 of 5 Enjoy the buzz and great beer 4 of 5 Quaint gardens and a lovely view 5 of 5 Tom Chesshyre Published 1 minute ago 
At the top of a hill on a bend of a lane in the north Cotswolds you will come to a honey-stone building with a discreet pub sign and a few hanging plants. So far, so ordinary, you might think: a nice little Georgian country inn. Yet, although this is true, there is much more to the Horse and Groom than meets the eye. Word has spread about this tucked away hostelry, and this week it was awarded The Good Pub Guide’s much-coveted “pub of the year 2016” title. 
In a nutshell Tom and Will Greenstock, brothers aged 39 and Subscribe now
